original_text: And she conceived again, and bare a son; and said, Now this time will my husband be joined unto me, because I have born him three sons: therefore was his name called Levi.
korean_text: 그가 또 임신하여 아들을 낳고 이르되 내가 그에게 세 아들을 낳았으니 내 남편이 지금부터 나와 연합하리로다 하고 그의 이름을 레위라 하였으며

sentences.original_text: Now this time will my husband be joined unto me
because I have born him three sons
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그에게 아들 셋을 낳았기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: therefore was his name called Levi
